alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Marshall; Panola; Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 5:20PM CDT until July 02 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern DeSoto County in northwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Marshall County in northwestern Mississippi... East central Tunica County in northwestern Mississippi... Tate County in northwestern Mississippi... Northern Panola County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 520 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Strayhorn, or 8 miles west of Senatobia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Senatobia, Sardis, Coldwater, Como, Crenshaw, Barr, Strayhorn, Pleasant Grove, Independence, Askew, Buxton, Cockrum, Savage, Aiken, Crossroad, Tyro, Glenville, Sarah, Poagville and Horatio. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
